nodes.text: The Upgrade Card Collection is a supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' tactical naval warfare game, Star Wars: Armada. It contains 290 cards, which are updated versions of all upgrade cards previously released, now in a new standard-sized format.

Unlock a hangar bay of 290 essential upgrades with the Star Wars: Armada Upgrade Card Collection! This collection provides updated versions of all upgrades previously printed as mini cards in a new standard-sized format.
With the addition of the Star Wars: Armada Core Set or a Fleet Starter, this Upgrade Card Collection gives you the flexibility to immediately start building the perfect fleet.
